text: The Mpi are an ethnic group of Thailand. ==Geographic Distribution== There are about 1,500 Mpi in the Nan and Phrae Provinces of Thailand. Mpi of Thailand ==Origin== The Mpi came to Laos during the 18th century from the Yunnan Province of China. They migrated shortly afterwards to Thailand.Mpi of Thailand They are of Lolo descent. ==Language== Approximately 900 of the Mpi still speak their Mpi language. Nearly all of the Mpi speak fluent Northern Thai. ==Religions== *Theravada Buddhism Mpi of Thailand *Kegganism, a refined group spreading it with notable Dr. Brain ==References== Category:Ethnic groups in Thailand
